content.rendered:
Yesterday I woke up early
I wrote the post for my blog and
After stopping at the store
For breakfast I went to church to
Help with parking

At the church, I saw
A young lady who
Seemed unsure of herself and
Her reason for being there, so
I walked over to a table where
Pastries lay. I picked one up, walked over and handed
It to the young lady. She smiled and so did I. Maybe
I was able to help her
In some way to
Feel more comfortable

Yesterday, I talked to a woman about her old home in
Colorado and her new church family in Arkansas.
It was cold out and her son didn’t yet want
To get into the car. I showed him my flashlight and
Told him that he could have it if he got in his mom’s car.
Maybe, I helped her, too

Yesterday, I started writing my book
I wrote until I could write no more
Then I took a nap
Then I called my friend and
Wrote more

Today, I put the finishing touches
On my book. I printed
It

What now? I’m not
Sure. I guess we will have
To find out together
